Material used.Description: Gene expression profiling was performed using HEK293 cells transfected with wild-type or mutant alpha-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: Microarray analysis showed altered expression of genes involved in synaptic function and mitochondrial dynamics in A30P cells compared to wild-type.
A53T cells exhibited dysregulation of genes related to lysosomal function and proteostasis.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each microarray experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein-transfected cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and multiple comparison tests were used to identify significant gene expression changes.

Material used.Description: Protein expression levels were analyzed in HEK293 cells overexpressing wild-type or mutant alpha-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutant showed increased aggregation of alpha-synuclein compared to wild-type, confirmed by Western blot and immunofluorescence.
A53T mutant exhibited enhanced oligomerization and reduced clearance of alpha-synuclein.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each Western blot experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein-transfected cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare protein expression levels between mutant and wild-type groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 15% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression ≥ 30% higher or lower than wild-type levels.
